title: Made a Sprite skill that OuterClaudes can use to drive InnerClaudes as test environments

brief.why: Need to test workflows, install patterns, and Claude-to-Claude interaction in clean VM environments without manual setup each time
brief.what: A skill enabling OuterClaude to control InnerClaude instances on Sprites.dev VMs via tmux pipe-pane pattern
brief.done: OuterClaude can SSH to sprite, start InnerClaude in tmux, send queries, and capture responses programmatically

title: Create test script that validates OuterClaude/InnerClaude pattern

brief.why: Executable verification is more reliable than docs — proves the pattern actually works
brief.what: scripts/test-innerclaude.sh that validates pipe-pane pattern end-to-end
brief.done: Script runs from local machine, tests sprite restore + pipe-pane + query + capture, clear pass/fail output

title: Document -p + --output-format json alternative for non-interactive queries

brief.why: The -p flag offers simpler approach for non-interactive queries but it's undocumented in the skill
brief.what: Reference doc explaining when to use -p vs interactive tmux, with JSON output examples
brief.done: Doc shows structured output example, explains permission_denials field, clear guidance on which approach for which use case

title: Field Report: OAuth tokens expire within ~24h, breaking sprite checkpoints

brief.why: Discovered that golden checkpoints with auth can't be relied upon — tokens expire too fast
brief.what: Document the OAuth expiry limitation and CLAUDE_CODE_OAUTH_TOKEN workaround
brief.done: Field report filed, skill updated with token export step and prerequisites

title: Teach linter to resolve symlinks before name check

brief.why: lint_skill.py checks name vs directory but doesn't resolve symlinks, causing false errors.
brief.what: In check_name(), resolve skill_dir with Path.resolve() before comparing to name. Optional: --no-symlink-resolve flag for strict mode.
brief.done: lint_skill.py passes for symlinked skills like google-workspace → skill-google-workspace
